page.title: 15CHILDREN'S LEISURE TIME
page.content: Children take part in sporting activities like their parents.Some of them belong to organisations such as Scouts,Guides,Cubs or Brownies and go to weekly meetings and learn how to purposefully use their leisure time. Many families have computers and so taking part in computer games consumes a great deal of leisure time. Because of the lack of public transport in this area and the isolation of many of the properties, children have to rely on their parents to take them to organised activities. If parents are not able or inclined to transport their children the teenagers especially become extremely bored and have much time on their hands.
